arts.ttl: Jordan Henderson stripped of Ajax captaincy and REFUSES interview as saga takes ugly turn
arts.sum: Ajax captain Jordan Henderson had the armband taken off him for Thursday night's Europa League clash with Galatasaray after asking for permission to pursue a move to AS Monaco

arts.ttl: Milan and Galatasaray Close to Finalising Morata Transfer
arts.sum: In a surprising turn of events, Alvaro Morata appears to be on the verge of leaving AC Milan for Galatasaray. The Spanish striker, who only joined the Rossoneri last summer, is now the subject of advanced negotiations between the two clubs. Ajax ended the Europa League group stage with a 2-1 win over Galatasaray in the Johan Cruijff ArenA. Ajax were almost assured of a playoff spot going into the game but a win would seal their place. arts.sum: According to L’Équipe, Ajax are lining up a move for Nice midfielder Pablo Rosario (28) to replace Monaco target Jordan Henderson (34). Les Monégasques are in negotiations with the Eredivisie club…

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours today: Ferguson to West Ham, Morata to Galatasaray, Almiron to Atlanta United
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Evan Ferguson to West Ham, Alvaro Morata to Galatasaray and Miguel Almiron to Atlanta United.

arts.ttl: Milan Push to Seal Gimenez Deal, Paving Way for Morata’s Galatasaray Move
arts.sum: AC Milan are stepping up their efforts to finalize the transfer of Santiago Gimenez from Feyenoord, a move that could trigger Alvaro Morata's departure to Galatasaray. The Rossoneri are working diligently with the Dutch club to bring the Mexican striker to Italy.
